content.text: How can I add an external account for transfers?

1. Go to Transfers ▸ Add External Account. 2. You can then schedule one‑time or recurring transfers up to $10 000 per day. 3. Verify the amounts in the app to activate the link. 4. Enter the routing and account numbers.
How do I close my account?

1. Download or export any statements you need for your records. 2. Call 1‑800‑TOGGLE or visit a branch to submit the closure request. 3. You’ll receive written confirmation once the account is closed (may take up to 5 business days). 4. Ensure your balance is $0 or transfer remaining funds.
Could you explain what are the daily ATM withdrawal limits?

1. Gold tier: $1 000 2. Diamond tier: $3 000 3. Bronze & Silver tiers: $500 4. Platinum tier: $1 500 5. Limits reset at 12:01 AM local time; increase requests can be made in‑app under Card Controls ▸ Temporary Limit.
What are the daily ATM withdrawal limits?

1. Bronze & Silver tiers: $500 2. Gold tier: $1 000 3. Platinum tier: $1 500 4. Diamond tier: $3 000 5. Limits reset at 12:01 AM local time; increase requests can be made in‑app under Card Controls ▸ Temporary Limit.
How do I enable two‑factor authentication (2FA)?

1. Choose SMS, Email, or Authenticator App. 2. 2FA is required for high‑risk actions like adding new payees or changing contact info. 3. Toggle “Two‑Factor Authentication”. 4. Enter the verification code to confirm activation. 5. Log in and go to Settings ▸ Security.
What is the procedure to are overdraft fees charged and how can I avoid them?

1. Standard overdraft fee: $29 per occurrence (max 3 per day). 2. Platinum and Diamond tiers receive one fee waiver per statement cycle automatically. 3. Enroll in Overdraft Protection to link a savings account—transfers are $5 instead of the standard fee. 4. Set up Balance Alerts to receive push notifications when your balance falls below a custom threshold. 5. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
How do I enable biometric login?

1. In the mobile app go to Settings ▸ Login & Security. 2. Toggle “Enable Face ID / Fingerprint”. 3. Authenticate with your device’s biometrics to confirm. 4. Next time you open the app, you can log in with biometrics instead of a password.
How do I enable biometric login?

1. In the mobile app go to Settings ▸ Login & Security. 2. Authenticate with your device’s biometrics to confirm. 3. Next time you open the app, you can log in with biometrics instead of a password. 4. Toggle “Enable Face ID / Fingerprint”. 5. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
Could you explain what is the process for setting a travel notice?

1. Confirm contact number in case of fraud alerts abroad. 2. You’ll receive an email confirmation; notices can be edited or canceled anytime. 3. Enter destination country, start date, and end date (up to 90 days).
Could you explain what is ToggleBank’s policy on wire transfer cut‑off times?

1. Outgoing wire fees vary by tier; incoming wires are free for Gold and above. 2. Domestic wires: 5 PM ET on business days. 3. Requests submitted after cut‑off are processed the next business day. 4. International wires: 3 PM ET.
What are the daily ATM withdrawal limits?
1. Diamond tier: $3 000 2. Gold tier: $1 000 3. Bronze & Silver tiers: $500 4. Platinum tier: $1 500
What is the procedure to do I view or download tax documents?

1. Download or print as needed for your records or tax preparer. 2. Forms (e.g., 1099‑INT) are released by January 31 for the prior year. 3. Log in and select More ▸ Documents ▸ Tax Documents. 4. Choose the tax year; statements are available in PDF.
Could you explain what are the daily ATM withdrawal limits?

1. Gold tier: $1 000 2. Limits reset at 12:01 AM local time; increase requests can be made in‑app under Card Controls ▸ Temporary Limit. 3. Bronze & Silver tiers: $500 4. Platinum tier: $1 500 5. Diamond tier: $3 000
What fees are waived for Gold tier customers?
1. No monthly maintenance fee. 2. No domestic ATM withdrawal fees at any network. 3. Free standard checks once per year. 4. Waived incoming wire fees. 5. Two free cashier’s checks per month.
How do I set up balance alerts?

1. Go to Settings ▸ Alerts ▸ Balance. 2. Choose threshold type: fixed dollar amount or percentage of average balance. 3. Select delivery method: push notification, SMS, or email. 4. Save preferences; alerts are sent in real time when the threshold is crossed.
What is the procedure to can I dispute an unauthorized transaction?

1. Navigate to Transactions in the mobile app and select the charge. 2. Tap “Report Issue” and choose “Unauthorized”. 3. Provide any supporting details or receipts; photos can be uploaded. 4. ToggleBank immediately places a temporary credit on your account while we investigate (may take up to 45 days). 5. You’ll receive status updates via push notification and email. 6. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
Could you explain what should I do if my debit card is lost or stolen?

1. Open the ToggleBank mobile app and tap Card Controls ▸ Lock Card. 2. Review recent transactions with the agent; disputed items are refunded provisionally in 10 business days. 3. A replacement card ships via priority mail within 3–5 calendar days (free for Gold tier and above). 4. Call 1‑800‑TOGGLE within 24 hours to report the loss (available 24/7).
Could you explain what is ToggleBank’s privacy policy regarding customer data?

1. ToggleBank does not sell personal information to third parties. 2. Customers may opt out of certain marketing communications under Settings ▸ Privacy. 3. For a full policy see togglebank.com/privacy. 4. Data is shared only with service providers who support banking operations and are bound by contract to safeguard it. 5. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
Could you explain what should I do if my debit card is lost or stolen?

1. Call 1‑800‑TOGGLE within 24 hours to report the loss (available 24/7). 2. Review recent transactions with the agent; disputed items are refunded provisionally in 10 business days. 3. Open the ToggleBank mobile app and tap Card Controls ▸ Lock Card. 4. A replacement card ships via priority mail within 3–5 calendar days (free for Gold tier and above).
How do I request a credit limit increase?

1. A soft credit pull is performed (does not affect credit score). 2. Provide current annual income and monthly housing payment. 3. Navigate to Cards ▸ Credit Card ▸ Manage ▸ Request Limit Increase. 4. You’ll receive approval or further steps instantly in most cases. 5. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
What is the procedure to do I view or download tax documents?

1. Download or print as needed for your records or tax preparer. 2. Choose the tax year; statements are available in PDF. 3. Log in and select More ▸ Documents ▸ Tax Documents. 4. Forms (e.g., 1099‑INT) are released by January 31 for the prior year. 5. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
What is the grace period for credit card payments?

1. ToggleBank credit cards have a 25‑day grace period from the statement close date. 2. Automatic payments can be set to avoid late fees. 3. If the full balance is paid by the due date, no interest is charged. 4. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
How do I request a credit limit increase?

1. Navigate to Cards ▸ Credit Card ▸ Manage ▸ Request Limit Increase. 2. You’ll receive approval or further steps instantly in most cases. 3. Provide current annual income and monthly housing payment. 4. A soft credit pull is performed (does not affect credit score). 5. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
What is the procedure to do I close my account?

1. You’ll receive written confirmation once the account is closed (may take up to 5 business days). 2. Call 1‑800‑TOGGLE or visit a branch to submit the closure request. 3. Ensure your balance is $0 or transfer remaining funds. 4. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
How do I enable biometric login?
1. Toggle “Enable Face ID / Fingerprint”. 2. Authenticate with your device’s biometrics to confirm. 3. Next time you open the app, you can log in with biometrics instead of a password.
Could you explain what is the grace period for credit card payments?

1. Automatic payments can be set to avoid late fees. 2. ToggleBank credit cards have a 25‑day grace period from the statement close date. 3. If the full balance is paid by the due date, no interest is charged.
What is ToggleBank’s policy on wire transfer cut‑off times?
1. Domestic wires: 5 PM ET on business days. 2. Outgoing wire fees vary by tier; incoming wires are free for Gold and above. 3. International wires: 3 PM ET.
How do I deposit a check using the mobile app?

1. Tap Deposit ▸ Mobile Check Deposit. 2. Endorse the back with “For ToggleBank Mobile Deposit” and today’s date. 3. Snap photos of the front and back ensuring all four corners are visible. 4. Enter the amount and choose the destination account. 5. Keep the physical check for 14 days; funds are usually available the next business day.
Could you explain what should I do if my debit card is lost or stolen?

1. A replacement card ships via priority mail within 3–5 calendar days (free for Gold tier and above). 2. Open the ToggleBank mobile app and tap Card Controls ▸ Lock Card. 3. Call 1‑800‑TOGGLE within 24 hours to report the loss (available 24/7). 4. Review recent transactions with the agent; disputed items are refunded provisionally in 10 business days.
What fees are waived for Gold tier customers?

1. Two free cashier’s checks per month. 2. Waived incoming wire fees. 3. Free standard checks once per year. 4. No monthly maintenance fee. 5. No domestic ATM withdrawal fees at any network. 6. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
How do I request a credit limit increase?

1. Navigate to Cards ▸ Credit Card ▸ Manage ▸ Request Limit Increase. 2. Provide current annual income and monthly housing payment. 3. A soft credit pull is performed (does not affect credit score). 4. You’ll receive approval or further steps instantly in most cases.
Could you explain what is ToggleBank’s policy on wire transfer cut‑off times?

1. Requests submitted after cut‑off are processed the next business day. 2. International wires: 3 PM ET. 3. Outgoing wire fees vary by tier; incoming wires are free for Gold and above. 4. Domestic wires: 5 PM ET on business days.
What is the procedure to are overdraft fees charged and how can I avoid them?

1. Enroll in Overdraft Protection to link a savings account—transfers are $5 instead of the standard fee. 2. Platinum and Diamond tiers receive one fee waiver per statement cycle automatically. 3. Standard overdraft fee: $29 per occurrence (max 3 per day). 4. Set up Balance Alerts to receive push notifications when your balance falls below a custom threshold.
What should I do if my debit card is lost or stolen?

1. Call 1‑800‑TOGGLE within 24 hours to report the loss (available 24/7). 2. Open the ToggleBank mobile app and tap Card Controls ▸ Lock Card. 3. Review recent transactions with the agent; disputed items are refunded provisionally in 10 business days. 4. A replacement card ships via priority mail within 3–5 calendar days (free for Gold tier and above).

1. Enroll in Overdraft Protection to link a savings account—transfers are $5 instead of the standard fee. 2. Platinum and Diamond tiers receive one fee waiver per statement cycle automatically.
What is the procedure to do I enable biometric login?

1. Toggle “Enable Face ID / Fingerprint”. 2. Next time you open the app, you can log in with biometrics instead of a password. 3. In the mobile app go to Settings ▸ Login & Security. 4. Authenticate with your device’s biometrics to confirm.

1. You’ll receive written confirmation once the account is closed (may take up to 5 business days). 2. Download or export any statements you need for your records. 3. Call 1‑800‑TOGGLE or visit a branch to submit the closure request. 4. Ensure your balance is $0 or transfer remaining funds.
What is the procedure to can I add an external account for transfers?

1. Enter the routing and account numbers. 2. ToggleBank sends two micro‑deposits within 1‑2 business days. 3. Go to Transfers ▸ Add External Account. 4. Verify the amounts in the app to activate the link.
What fees are waived for Gold tier customers?
1. No monthly maintenance fee. 2. Free standard checks once per year. 3. No domestic ATM withdrawal fees at any network. 4. Waived incoming wire fees. 5. Two free cashier’s checks per month.
Could you explain what are the standard interest rates for savings accounts?
1. Diamond: 1.85% APY (rates subject to change weekly). 2. Gold: 1.10% APY 3. Bronze: 0.45% APY 4. Platinum: 1.35% APY 5. Silver: 0.60% APY

Could you explain what are the different account tiers and how do I qualify?

1. Bronze: default tier, no minimum balance. 2. Gold: maintain $10 000 or more across all accounts or direct deposit $2 000+/month. 3. Diamond: invitation‑only, requires $250 000+ in combined balances. 4. Platinum: maintain $50 000+ or a ToggleBank mortgage. 5. Silver: maintain average daily balance of $1 000 or more.

1. Silver: maintain average daily balance of $1 000 or more. 2. Platinum: maintain $50 000+ or a ToggleBank mortgage. 3. Bronze: default tier, no minimum balance. 4. Diamond: invitation‑only, requires $250 000+ in combined balances.
What is the procedure to do I set up balance alerts?

1. Save preferences; alerts are sent in real time when the threshold is crossed. 2. Select delivery method: push notification, SMS, or email. 3. Choose threshold type: fixed dollar amount or percentage of average balance. 4. Go to Settings ▸ Alerts ▸ Balance.
Could you explain what is the process for setting a travel notice?

1. You’ll receive an email confirmation; notices can be edited or canceled anytime. 2. Confirm contact number in case of fraud alerts abroad. 3. In the mobile app go to Card Controls ▸ Travel Notice. 4. Enter destination country, start date, and end date (up to 90 days).
How do I set up balance alerts?

1. Select delivery method: push notification, SMS, or email. 2. Save preferences; alerts are sent in real time when the threshold is crossed. 3. Go to Settings ▸ Alerts ▸ Balance. 4. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
What should I do if my debit card is lost or stolen?

1. Review recent transactions with the agent; disputed items are refunded provisionally in 10 business days. 2. A replacement card ships via priority mail within 3–5 calendar days (free for Gold tier and above). 3. Open the ToggleBank mobile app and tap Card Controls ▸ Lock Card. 4. Call 1‑800‑TOGGLE within 24 hours to report the loss (available 24/7).
What are the standard interest rates for savings accounts?
1. Diamond: 1.85% APY (rates subject to change weekly). 2. Gold: 1.10% APY 3. Platinum: 1.35% APY 4. Silver: 0.60% APY 5. Bronze: 0.45% APY
Could you explain what should I do if my debit card is lost or stolen?

1. Call 1‑800‑TOGGLE within 24 hours to report the loss (available 24/7). 2. A replacement card ships via priority mail within 3–5 calendar days (free for Gold tier and above). 3. Open the ToggleBank mobile app and tap Card Controls ▸ Lock Card. 4. Review recent transactions with the agent; disputed items are refunded provisionally in 10 business days.
How can I dispute an unauthorized transaction?

1. ToggleBank immediately places a temporary credit on your account while we investigate (may take up to 45 days). 2. Provide any supporting details or receipts; photos can be uploaded. 3. Tap “Report Issue” and choose “Unauthorized”. 4. Navigate to Transactions in the mobile app and select the charge. 5. You’ll receive status updates via push notification and email.
What is the procedure to do I close my account?

1. Download or export any statements you need for your records. 2. Ensure your balance is $0 or transfer remaining funds. 3. Call 1‑800‑TOGGLE or visit a branch to submit the closure request. 4. You’ll receive written confirmation once the account is closed (may take up to 5 business days).
How do I deposit a check using the mobile app?

1. Enter the amount and choose the destination account. 2. Tap Deposit ▸ Mobile Check Deposit. 3. Endorse the back with “For ToggleBank Mobile Deposit” and today’s date. 4. Snap photos of the front and back ensuring all four corners are visible. 5. Keep the physical check for 14 days; funds are usually available the next business day.
What are the daily ATM withdrawal limits?

1. Gold tier: $1 000 2. Bronze & Silver tiers: $500 3. Limits reset at 12:01 AM local time; increase requests can be made in‑app under Card Controls ▸ Temporary Limit. 4. Platinum tier: $1 500 5. Diamond tier: $3 000
What is the procedure to do I enable biometric login?

1. In the mobile app go to Settings ▸ Login & Security. 2. Authenticate with your device’s biometrics to confirm. 3. Next time you open the app, you can log in with biometrics instead of a password. 4. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
Could you explain what is the grace period for credit card payments?

1. ToggleBank credit cards have a 25‑day grace period from the statement close date. 2. If the full balance is paid by the due date, no interest is charged. 3. Automatic payments can be set to avoid late fees.
What is the procedure to do I request a credit limit increase?

1. Provide current annual income and monthly housing payment. 2. A soft credit pull is performed (does not affect credit score). 3. You’ll receive approval or further steps instantly in most cases. 4. Navigate to Cards ▸ Credit Card ▸ Manage ▸ Request Limit Increase.
What is the procedure to do I set up balance alerts?

1. Go to Settings ▸ Alerts ▸ Balance. 2. Choose threshold type: fixed dollar amount or percentage of average balance. 3. Save preferences; alerts are sent in real time when the threshold is crossed. 4. Select delivery method: push notification, SMS, or email.
What is ToggleBank’s privacy policy regarding customer data?

1. For a full policy see togglebank.com/privacy. 2. Data is shared only with service providers who support banking operations and are bound by contract to safeguard it. 3. Customers may opt out of certain marketing communications under Settings ▸ Privacy. 4. ToggleBank does not sell personal information to third parties.
How do I set up balance alerts?

1. Choose threshold type: fixed dollar amount or percentage of average balance. 2. Select delivery method: push notification, SMS, or email. 3. Go to Settings ▸ Alerts ▸ Balance. 4. Save preferences; alerts are sent in real time when the threshold is crossed.
What is the procedure to do I reset my online banking password?

1. From the login screen choose “Forgot Password”. 2. Log in with the new password; the change takes effect immediately. 3. Select a delivery method to receive a one‑time verification code. 4. Enter the code within 10 minutes and choose a new strong password. 5. Enter your username and the last 4 digits of your Social Security Number.
How are overdraft fees charged and how can I avoid them?

1. Set up Balance Alerts to receive push notifications when your balance falls below a custom threshold. 2. Standard overdraft fee: $29 per occurrence (max 3 per day). 3. Enroll in Overdraft Protection to link a savings account—transfers are $5 instead of the standard fee. 4. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.

Select a delivery method to receive a one‑time verification code. 5. Enter your username and the last 4 digits of your Social Security Number.

What is the procedure to do I view or download tax documents?

1. Log in and select More ▸ Documents ▸ Tax Documents. 2. Download or print as needed for your records or tax preparer. 3. Forms (e.g., 1099‑INT) are released by January 31 for the prior year. 4. If you need further assistance, contact ToggleSupport via chat 24/7.
